TestDescription.name: Chrome Logger information disclosure
TestDescription.Description: Chrome Logger is a Google Chrome extension for debugging server side applications in the Chrome console. When enabled, the server side component will return headers named X-ChromePhp-Data or X-ChromeLogger-Data. The value of these headers contains possible sensitive information and should not be present in production systems.
TestDescription.Impact: The header value may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Disable debugging helpers in production systems.
